titleStmt.title: A description of the king and queene of fayries, their habit, fare, their abode, pompe, and state Beeing very delightfull to the sense, and full of mirth.
titleStmt.author: R. S., fl. 1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Harper] for Richard Harper, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Hospitall gate,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; cropped with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the Hospitall gate
